attributes.action: Tax spent on royal family to go into the NHS instead
attributes.additional_details:
I can't even believe we already pay for these already rich people to keep being rich while the NHS which is keeping people alive and well, a basic human right need, is struggling.

It is time to stop funding the royals
attributes.background: The royal family should not be receiving any amount of  tax payers money. They have enough money already and in a time of national crisis it is time to put that money into the NHS.

rejection.details: We understand that you're concerned about how the monarchy is funded, but the funding for the Monarchy is a proportion of the sovereign's income from the Crown Estate, and not funded by taxpayers. You can find out more here: https://www.royal.uk/royal-finances-0
